means: 用电的，与电有关的，电学的
令人激动的，紧张的，惊人的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"电的"之意。
means: electric ： 强调与电有直接的关系。一般而言，凡表示产生电的或由电开动、操纵的机器或装置要用electric,如electric motor(电动机)，electric batteries(电池)、electric fan(电扇)等；或表示"本身带电的"，"由电产生的"要用electric,如electric current(电流)、electric wave(电波)、electric arc(电弧)等。
electrical ： 强调与电的关系是间接的。凡指电气性质，同电有关的或涉及电气科学技术研究的多用electrical，如electrical test(电气试验)、electrical engineering(电气工程)、electrical fault(电气故障)、electrical noise(电噪声)、electrical engineer(电气工程师)等。
electronic是electronics(电子学)的形容词，指与电子装置有关的或使用电子装置的。

word_mean: ［measurement］method 将被测振动量转换成对应的电量变化，然后用振动测量仪器测量振动量的方法。

sentence.Network_en: This degree programme is fully accredited by the Institution of Electrical Engineers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这门学位课程经电气工程师学院鉴定完全合格。

sentence.Network_en: The aircraft made an unscheduled landing after developing an electrical fault.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞机由于发生电力故障而作了临时降落。

sentence.Network_en: There are consistent reports of electrical torture being practised on inmates.
sentence.Network_cn: 一直有报道称犯人被施以电刑。

entry.def: Electrical goods, equipment, or appliances work by means of electricity.
Electrical systems or parts supply or use electricity.
Electrical energy is energy in the form of electricity.

entry.tran: 制造电气设备的;供电的
entry.def: Electrical industries, engineers, or workers are involved in the production and supply of electricity or electrical goods.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or concerned with electricity;
2. using or providing or producing or transmitting or operated by electricity;

auth_sentence.content: It comes down to - electrical batteries vs. biodiesel.
auth_sentence.res_content: It comes down to - electrical batteries vs. biodiesel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It comes down to - electrical batteries vs. biodiesel.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"电" 注:electr的原义是琥珀,现指由于磨擦琥珀而产生的电

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电的, 导电的, 电动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: electr电+ic……的→adj.电的, 导电的, 电动的
electric电的, 导电的+al..的→adj.电的, 有关电的
electr电+on物理上一些名词→n.电子

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使充电,使通电;使电气化
stems_affixes.word_buile: electr电+ify……化→v.使充电,使通电;使电气化

Sentence.sentence: In addition, at that time a greater percentage of homes and electrical plants were run on petroleum than today.

jushi.english: All the electrical work was done by my brother.
jushi.chinese: 所有的电工活都由我哥干。

jushi.english: The cooker isn't working because of an electrical fault.
jushi.chinese: 这个炊具不能用了,因为电气设备出了故障。
